attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: following the announcement of the Government's intention to facilitate the construction of new nuclear poer stations it is the opinion of the signatories that Chapelcross nuclear power station based newar Annan, Dumfriesshire, should be re-built.  it has provided over 50 year support to the nuclear industry where proud local nuclear workers who are experienced in working in such an environement can have their careers secured for many years to come.
